title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Books next appointment while driving (voice?)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Customer posts requirements with budget/timeline". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Service add-ons (deep conditioning)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
